description:
It's a daily dose of family advice and encouragement in the palm of your hand. With Focus on the Family's free application, you can now get our daily broadcast delivered directly to your Palm device. You'll never have to miss a single program!

Features:

- Take the latest marriage, parenting and social policy insights from Focus on the Family wherever you go!

- Enjoy easy access to today's broadcast, or browse an archive of recent daily programs

- Browse links to related content and resources designed to help you and your family thrive

- Make a donation to support the ongoing work of Focus on the Family

- Use the Feedback option to contact Focus directly from your mobile device
versionNote: Updated into a webview to so that the content is contained within a webview and not a separate browser window. This gives a better expected behavior when the application icon is picked instead of a blank window for one of the views.
